sentences.en: A huge rattlesnake lay coiled on the blanket.
sentences.cn: 一条巨大的响尾蛇盘绕在毯子上。

sentences.en: A rattlesnake is a really mean creature.
And beside it outstretched the skin of a rattlesnake glittered.
sentences.cn: 旁边展开一张响尾蛇皮,闪着光.

sentences.en: Bee attacks, like rattlesnake bites, are mostly a matter of bad luck.
sentences.cn: 蜜蜂攻击或是蛇咬都可以归因为运气不好.

sentences.en: He had been bitten by a rattlesnake.
His eldest brother died after the venomous bite from the rattlesnake.
sentences.cn: 遭到毒蛇咬后,他大哥死了.

sentences.en: Horny rings on a rattlesnake's tail a rattling noise when shaken.
sentences.cn: 响尾蛇尾部的角质环,摆动时格格作响.

sentences.en: I guess that's why this town is called Rattlesnake Flats.
sentences.cn: 我猜想这就是为什么这个镇叫做坦斯那克了.

sentences.en: One family of completely harmless snakes, the kingsnake, has also evolved serum that neutralizes rattlesnake venom and uses that ability to greater advantage than ground squirrels do.
sentences.cn: 完全无毒蛇大家庭中的一种，王蛇，也进化出了能中和响尾蛇毒液的血清，并且靠着这一能力获得了比松鼠们更大的好处。

sentences.en: Rattlesnake skin is used for fancy bags and purses.
sentences.cn: 响尾蛇皮被用来制作精美的提包和钱包.

sentences.en: Sidewinder, an air - to - air missile bearing the name of a rattlesnake, is launched from a fighter plane.
sentences.cn: “响尾蛇式”导弹是一种取名为响尾蛇的空对空导弹, 它从战斗机上发射.

sentences.en: The rattlesnake has enough venom to kill about a thousand pack rats.
sentences.cn: 一条响尾蛇的毒液足以杀死一千只林鼠.

sentences.en: The rattlesnake tissues provoked the strongest response of all the species in the study.
sentences.cn: 响尾蛇的组织在本次所有研究物种中所作出的反应最强烈。

sentences.en: The renegade is the first cousin to a rattlesnake.
sentences.cn: 叛徒象响尾蛇一样地毒狠.

sentences.en: Then from the rattlesnake's skin , with a sudden , contemptuous gesture.
sentences.cn: 于是从响尾蛇皮中间, 飞快地,他以轻蔑的手势.

sentences.en: We saw a real live rattlesnake!
sentences.cn: 我们看到一条真的响尾蛇!

sentences.en: When the man spotted the rattlesnake, he drew back and aimed his shotgun.
sentences.cn: 当这个人确认出那是只响尾蛇后, 他往后退并瞄准了它.

trans.tran_en: a poisonous American snake that shakes its tail to make a noise when it is angry
